channel.title: ABRSPS | Friendly Community | Duo Slayer | Customisable Client & much more!
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://abrsps.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/0k3U4pd.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/icon_homepage_zpsfcc29152.png[/img] [B]Website:[/B] [url=http://www.abrsps.com]Click Here.[/url] [URL=http://abrsps.com/webclient/ancientblitz.jar] [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Playnowbutton_zpsa642b955.jpg[/img][/URL] [/CENTER]
[U][B]Server Features:[/B][/U]
[ul]Core re-work for great server stability [*]Friendly and active community [*]Duo Slayer [*]Dwarf multi cannon [*]In game PvP highscores [*]Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding [*]Flawless combat system [*]Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable [*]A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits [*]All skills fully working and being worked on every day [*]Daily server and website updates [*]A hard working owner who listens to his players [*]Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops [*]Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items! [*]Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage [*]Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking [*]The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime [*]Fast combat XP rates so you can get right in and pk [*]Max cape for players who accomplish all 99's [*]Highscores and auto donations [*]And many, many more features join today to see them for your self![/ul]
[CENTER][B][U]Media:[/U][/B][/CENTER]
[SPOILER="Pictures"] [SPOILER="General Media"] [B][CENTER] [URL=http://abrsps.com][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/20p6e74.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQrw1VA.png[/img] [/CENTER][/B] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Mini-Games"] [B][CENTER][URL=http://abrsps.com]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aMJfoBr.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kjqIdNl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pOox1CZ.png[/img]
[/CENTER][/B][/url] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Bosses"] [B][CENTER][URL=http://abrsps.com]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SWZlEzy.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kHjnUQs.png[/img]
[/B] [/CENTER] [/SPOILER] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][URL=http://abrsps.com]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/h1gvqVm.jpg[/img] [/CENTER]
[B][U]Why should you choose to play AncientBlitz over other servers?[/U][/B]
AncientBlitz offers the community many options that are vacant in other runescape server communitys. Some of the options we offer are stability, friendly staff, active owners, and unique content. Our server has been created to hold a player base greater than 1,000 players, and has been tested to still run perfectly at this peak. We offer you staff that us the owners have known for over two years and have got to known well, they have been around our server for well over two years now. The two owners, That Kid and Theglove, are active and are always up for suggestions. We also offer unique content, we have a custom minigame called The Champions Scroll Minigame, along with other cool unique content that our community loves. These are only some of the reasons you should join us, hop on to see what we are really made of!
Use one of our support banners! Click below for a few.
[SPOILER=Support signatures]
[CENTER][URL=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/advertise/578052-abrsps-friendly-community-duo-slayer-customisable-client-much-more.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XMnNu.png[/img][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: ABRSPS | Friendly Community | Duo Slayer | Customisable Client & much more!

item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[CENTER][URL=http://abrsps.com][/URL]

[B]Website:[/B] Click Here.
[URL=http://abrsps.com/webclient/ancientblitz.jar]
[/URL]
[/CENTER]

[U][B]Server Features:[/B][/U]

[ul]Core re-work for great server stability
[]Friendly and active community
[]Duo Slayer
[]Dwarf multi cannon
[]In game PvP highscores
[]Perfect item switches for amazing hybridding
[]Flawless combat system
[]Client settings - Including 100% fullscreen & resizeable
[]A unique Donator zone with many Donator benefits
[]All skills fully working and being worked on every day
[]Daily server and website updates
[]A hard working owner who listens to his players
[]Pk Points for killing players and Voting Points both with amazing reward shops
[]Many bosses to defeat all dropping well rewarding items!
[]Clean and efficient client, small cache size and low memory usage
[]Many mini-games including fully working duel arena with staking
[]The server is hosted on a powerful VPS which is ran 24/7 for 100% uptime
[]Fast combat XP rates so you can get right in and pk
[]Max cape for players who accomplish all 99’s
[]Highscores and auto donations
[]And many, many more features join today to see them for your self![/ul]

[B][U]Why should you choose to play AncientBlitz over other servers?[/U][/B]

AncientBlitz offers the community many options that are vacant in other runescape server communitys. Some of the options we offer are stability, friendly staff, active owners, and unique content. Our server has been created to hold a player base greater than 1,000 players, and has been tested to still run perfectly at this peak. We offer you staff that us the owners have known for over two years and have got to known well, they have been around our server for well over two years now. The two owners, That Kid and Theglove, are active and are always up for suggestions. We also offer unique content, we have a custom minigame called The Champions Scroll Minigame, along with other cool unique content that our community loves. These are only some of the reasons you should join us, hop on to see what we are really made of!

Use one of our support banners! Click below for a few.
